title: OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_PEDS_CAN_STAND_ON_TOP_FLAG
content:
0x7FA03E76// OverrideVehiclePedsCanStandOnTopFlag
void OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_PEDS_CAN_STAND_ON_TOP_FLAG(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL can);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle.can: Can they?Overrides whether or not peds can stand on top of the specified vehicle.Note this flag is not replicated automatically, you will have to manually do so.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_PEDS_CAN_STAND_ON_TOP_FLAG
OverrideVehiclePedsCanStandOnTopFlag(vehicle, false)
